name: Lost in Transmission (WINSTXN)
description:
Made in 3 days for Mini Jam 107. Theme: Music. Limitation: Gravity Control.

Lost in Transmission is a small gravity-based puzzle game where you have to guide transmissions through ruthless solar systems during times of intergalactic tension. It consists of 5 levels, each growing in difficulty as the music intensifies.

This was mostly an exercise in game development, but I'm happy with how it turned out. I'm not usually one to make puzzle games so this was pretty new to me.

Try it out and let me know what you think :)

- WINSTXN
